statements: SELECT * FROM auto_responses;
SELECT id, query_text FROM auto_responses;
SELECT response_text FROM auto_responses;
SELECT id, query_text, response_text FROM auto_responses WHERE id = 1;
SELECT query_text, response_text FROM auto_responses WHERE query_text = 'Hello';
SELECT * FROM auto_responses WHERE response_text LIKE '%bye%';
SELECT id, query_text FROM auto_responses WHERE id > 10;
SELECT * FROM auto_responses ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM auto_responses WHERE response_text IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM auto_responses;
SELECT MAX(id) FROM auto_responses;
SELECT id, UPPER(query_text) FROM auto_responses;
SELECT id, CONCAT(query_text, ' ', response_text) AS conversation FROM auto_responses;
SELECT id, query_text FROM auto_responses WHERE query_text IN ('Hello', 'Hi');
SELECT id, response_text FROM auto_responses WHERE response_text != 'Sorry';
SELECT DISTINCT query_text FROM auto_responses;
SELECT id, query_text FROM auto_responses WHERE query_text LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM auto_responses LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, query_text FROM auto_responses WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT id, query_text FROM auto_responses WHERE query_text = 'Help' OR response_text = 'Assistance';
SELECT * FROM auto_responses WHERE id = 1;
SELECT query_text, response_text FROM auto_responses WHERE id > 10;
SELECT query_text FROM auto_responses WHERE response_text LIKE '%hello%';
SELECT * FROM auto_responses WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM auto_responses;
SELECT DISTINCT id FROM auto_responses;
SELECT id, query_text, response_text FROM auto_responses WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM auto_responses ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM auto_responses WHERE query_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM auto_responses WHERE query_text = response_text;
SELECT MAX(id) FROM auto_responses;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM auto_responses;
SELECT DISTINCT response_text FROM auto_responses WHERE query_text LIKE '%bye%';
SELECT * FROM auto_responses WHERE LENGTH(query_text) > 10;
SELECT * FROM auto_responses WHERE query_text <> response_text;
SELECT id, CONCAT(query_text, ' - ', response_text) AS concatenated_text FROM auto_responses;
SELECT * FROM auto_responses WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 OR id BETWEEN 15 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM auto_responses WHERE query_text REGEXP '^[A-Za-z]+$';
SELECT * FROM auto_responses WHERE query_text IS NULL OR response_text IS NULL;
SELECT id, UPPER(query_text) AS uppercase_query FROM auto_responses;
SELECT id, LOWER(response_text) AS lowercase_response FROM auto_responses;
SELECT * FROM customer_queries;
SELECT customer_id, query_text FROM customer_queries WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT query_text FROM customer_queries WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM response_triggers;
SELECT trigger_id, query_id, response_text FROM response_triggers WHERE trigger_id = 10;
SELECT query_id, response_text FROM response_triggers WHERE trigger_id = 15;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, response_text FROM customer_queries JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, response_text FROM customer_queries LEFT JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, response_text FROM customer_queries RIGHT JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, response_text FROM customer_queries INNER JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, response_text FROM customer_queries CROSS JOIN response_triggers;
SELECT customer_id, query_text FROM customer_queries ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, query_text FROM customer_queries ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, query_text FROM customer_queries LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, query_text FROM customer_queries OFFSET 3;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_queries;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_queries FROM customer_queries GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(customer_id) AS max_id FROM customer_queries;
SELECT customer_id, query_text FROM customer_queries WHERE query_text LIKE 'Search%';
SELECT customer_id, query_text FROM customer_queries WHERE query_text IN ('Query 1', 'Query 2');
SELECT * FROM customer_queries;
SELECT customer_id, query_text FROM customer_queries;
SELECT customer_id, query_text FROM customer_queries WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM response_triggers;
SELECT trigger_id, query_id, response_text FROM response_triggers;
SELECT trigger_id, query_id, response_text FROM response_triggers WHERE trigger_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, response_text FROM customer_queries JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, response_text FROM customer_queries JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, response_text FROM customer_queries LEFT JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, response_text FROM customer_queries RIGHT JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, response_text FROM customer_queries INNER JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, response_text FROM customer_queries CROSS JOIN response_triggers;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_queries FROM customer_queries GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_triggers FROM response_triggers GROUP BY query_id;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, COUNT(query_id) AS total_triggers FROM customer_queries LEFT JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, query_text, COUNT(query_id) AS total_triggers FROM customer_queries LEFT JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(query_id) > 0;

SELECT customer_id, query_text, MAX(trigger_id) AS highest_trigger_id FROM customer_queries LEFT JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, query_text, MIN(trigger_id) AS lowest_trigger_id FROM customer_queries LEFT JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, AVG(query_id) AS avg_query_id FROM customer_queries LEFT JOIN response_triggers ON customer_queries.customer_id = response_triggers.query_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_queries;
SELECT customer_id, query_text FROM customer_queries WHERE query_text LIKE '%important%';

SELECT AVG(query_id) AS avg_query_id FROM SQLQueries;
SELECT query_text, trigger_text FROM SQLQueries RIGHT JOIN Triggers ON SQLQueries.trigger_id = Triggers.trigger_id;
SELECT trigger_text, COUNT(*) AS total_queries FROM SQLQueries JOIN Triggers ON SQLQueries.trigger_id = Triggers.trigger_id GROUP BY trigger_text;

SELECT CustomerQueries.id, query_text, response_text FROM CustomerQueries LEFT JOIN ResponseHistory ON CustomerQueries.id = ResponseHistory.query_id;
SELECT CustomerQueries.id, query_text FROM CustomerQueries INNER JOIN ResponseHistory ON CustomerQueries.id = ResponseHistory.query_id WHERE response_id IS NOT NULL;

SELECT * FROM ResponsesToQueries ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT query_text, response_text FROM CustomerQueries WHERE query_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, query_text, response_text FROM PredefinedSQLQueries ORDER BY query_text ASC;
SELECT * FROM TriggerLogs WHERE trigger_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, trigger_event, trigger_time FROM TriggerLogs WHERE trigger_time < '2022-02-15';

SELECT * FROM CustomerQueries WHERE query_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY query_date DESC;

SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM CustomerQueries GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM ResponsesToQueries r JOIN CustomerQueries c ON r.id = c.id;
SELECT MAX(query_id) AS max_query_id FROM CustomerQueryHistory;
SELECT query_text, query_date FROM CustomerQueries WHERE customer_id = 5 AND query_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(query_date) AS latest_query_date FROM CustomerQueries GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM CustomerQueryHistory;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS unique_customers FROM CustomerQueries;
SELECT * FROM ResponsesToQueries WHERE query_text LIKE '%important%' AND response_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(CASE WHEN query_date >= '2022-01-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS queries_this_year FROM CustomerQueries GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_query_id FROM ResponsesToQueries;
SELECT query_text, response_text FROM PredefinedSQLQueries WHERE response_text IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM CustomerQueries c LEFT JOIN CustomerQueryHistory h ON c.id = h.query_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_queries FROM CustomerQueries GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_queries DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MIN(query_date) AS first_query_date, MAX(query_date) AS latest_query_date FROM CustomerQueries;
SELECT id, query_text, response_text FROM ResponsesToQueries WHERE response_text IN ('Yes', 'No');
